title: HYPNODRAMA TO FREE YOURSELF FROM FEAR
description:
Dr. Marco Paret induced a strong hypnotic trance that freed the subject from fear. He used the powerful hypnotic technique of Fascination - the power of the gaze, which is the main key to all of the hypnotic states. The gaze, when properly used, allows two people to come into really deep contact. The subject entered in hypnotic induction and her hands became cataleptic. After the experience, she felt like a new person who forgot about the fear she had.  Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.
